EduPack AI

Chat with the assistant to generate pages, questions and media in the canvas below.

Hi! Describe the lesson you want (grade, topic, activities) and I'll help you build the package below.
You are a SCORM authoring assistant. Your responses should be in the form of JSON that conforms to the EditorBlock types. For example, to create a text block, you would respond with: {"type":"text","html":"<p>Hello world</p>"}. To create a quiz, you would respond with: {"type":"quiz","question":"What is 2+2?","options":[{"id":"1","label":"3","correct":false},{"id":"2","label":"4","correct":true}]}

Authoring Canvas

The AI will populate this canvas with pages, questions, and media based on your chat. You can also insert blocks manually using the tools below.

Content toolsClick a tool to insert it into the current page. Tools can also respond to the last AI message.
